thread.title: Is Andy Sugden returning to Emmerdale? Boss responds to rumours | Metro News
thread.title_full: Is Andy Sugden returning to Emmerdale? Boss responds to rumours | Metro News

author: Duncan Lindsay For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Is Andy Sugden returning to Emmerdale? Boss responds to rumours | Metro News
text:
Duncan Lindsay for Metro.co.uk Sunday 19 Feb 2017 7:00 am (Picture: ITV) 
It’s been one of the hot topics among Emmerdale fans recently – is Andy Sugden heading back to the village? With Lachlan White being jailed after admitting the crime Andy was accused of and with his daughter Sarah battling a life threatening illness, the stage seemed set for Kelvin Fletcher to reprise his role. 
But, while boss Iain MacLeod would be keen to have Andy back, he has revealed that there are no current plans for the character to come home. Boo! 
He told Metro.co.uk at a recent event: ‘There are no plans to do that at the moment but I’d have to be an idiot not to have it in the back of my mind as Andy Sugden is such a huge character and Kelvin’s an amazing actor. 
‘There’s nothing on the table to that effect at present but I never stop thinking about random, surprising things that might happen or (people who may) return so I wouldn’t rule it out.’ 
Andy went on the run after being framed by Chrissie for the shooting of Lawrence. All the press event gossip! 
In case you missed any, here are links to all of the articles from the Emmerdale press event. 
First details of Chas’ exit revealed
